statements: SELECT * FROM SocialMediaInteractions
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content FROM SocialMediaInteractions WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content, interaction_type FROM SocialMediaInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT post_id, interaction_type FROM SocialMediaInteractions WHERE user_id IN (234, 567) ORDER BY post_id ASC
SELECT post_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM SocialMediaInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like'
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM SocialMediaInteractions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content FROM SocialMediaInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM SocialMediaInteractions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT MAX(interaction_timestamp) AS latest_interaction FROM SocialMediaInteractions
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM SocialMediaInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, username, email, location, profile_bio FROM social_media_users;
SELECT email, username, location, profile_bio, user_id FROM social_media_users;
SELECT log_id, interaction_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM analytics_logs;
SELECT interaction_type, target_username, interaction_content, interaction_timestamp FROM cyberbullying_interactions;
SELECT username, email, location FROM social_media_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM social_media_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM cyberbullying_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT AI.log_id, CI.user_id, AI.log_timestamp, AI.log_message FROM analytics_logs AS AI JOIN cyberbullying_interactions AS CI ON AI.interaction_id = CI.interaction_id;
SELECT DISTINCT username, location FROM social_media_users WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM Interactions WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Interactions WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY interaction_date;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE date_joined >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT Users.username, Posts.post_content FROM Users INNER JOIN Posts ON Users.user_id = Posts.user_id
SELECT interactions.interaction_type, Users.username FROM Interactions INNER JOIN Users ON Interactions.user_id = Users.user_id WHERE interaction_type = 'like'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, comment, comment_date FROM comments WHERE post_id = 5 AND user_id = 3;
SELECT post_id, flag_reason, flag_date, status FROM flagged_posts ORDER BY flag_date;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT users.username, comments.comment FROM users JOIN comments ON users.user_id = comments.user_id;
SELECT post_content, flag_reason FROM posts JOIN flagged_posts ON posts.post_id = flagged_posts.post_id WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT post_id, post_date, post_content FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT username, number_of_followers FROM SocialMediaAccounts WHERE number_of_followers > 10000;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text, comment_date FROM Comments WHERE post_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE social_media_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Comments JOIN Posts ON Comments.post_id = Posts.post_id;
SELECT Users.username, Posts.post_content, Comments.comment_text FROM Users JOIN Posts ON Users.user_id = Posts.social_media_id JOIN Comments ON Posts.post_id = Comments.post_id;
